Dialogue.text: Good morning, Sector 7! Today is the 2nd day of Jeha, just nine days before Overlord Aso's next visit.

Dialogue367.text: Boy, could you imagine how awful it would be to wait your whole life to see the overlord, only for something to mess it up?

Dialogue376.text: In other news, scientists are learning more about the virus from Sector 6. They're calling it the CX-6 Virus

Dialogue385.text: Apparently, most who contract CX-6 are contagious before showing symptoms, several days on average.
